author: dkhaywood
msg: Bug fix: boolean handling in DnD viewer (got removed during facet refactoring and introduction of BooleanValueFacet).

author: dkhaywood
msg: factored out a new InteractionType to make explicit the fact that modifying parameters on their own (eg to fire off a @RegEx validation) there is no target object (or rather, the target object is the proposed parameter value itself).

author: dkhaywood
msg: Fixed bug with validateXxx on properties causing a NPE; renamed NakedObjectUtil#getObjectFrom to the more succinct #unwrap; factored out a new InteractionType to make explicit the fact that modifying parameters on their own (eg to fire off a @RegEx validation) there is no target object (or rather, the target object is the proposed parameter value itself).
